summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Real Estate Decision Assistant with Supabase backend. Successfully tested authentication flows, project management, and criteria system. Identified critical session persistence issue affecting user experience.

critical_bugs.issue: User sessions expire very quickly (within 1-2 minutes) causing frequent redirects to auth page
critical_bugs.impact: Severely impacts user experience - users get logged out while using the app

critical_bugs.issue: TypeError: Failed to execute 'text' on 'Response': body stream already read
critical_bugs.impact: Criteria initialization shows error message but still works

integration_issues.issue: Supabase auth sessions not persisting properly - users get logged out frequently

passed_tests: Supabase connection and database queries (17 system criteria, 93 enum values)
User signup flow with email/password authentication
User login flow with proper validation
Project creation dialog with all form fields (title, type, urgency, budgets)
Project list display with correct details (type, urgency, budget)
Multiple input types: boolean (checkbox), number (min/max), enum (dropdown)
Back navigation from project detail to projects list
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix Supabase auth session persistence issue - users are getting logged out every 1-2 minutes which makes the app unusable. Also investigate and fix the criteria initialization error message.
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (Supabase working), Frontend: 70% (core functionality works but session issues)
